publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4730 Brian Adam: Northfield Academy’s 50th Anniversary—That the Parliament congratulates Northfield Academy in Aberdeen on reaching its 50th anniversary; notes that a number of events have been arranged to celebrate this milestone date, and hopes that the staff and pupils of Northfield Academy will continue to make positive contributions in the community for many more years. Supported by: Dr Jean Turner*, Mr David Davidson*, Robin Harper*, Fergus Ewing*, Ms Maureen Watt*, John Swinburne*, Mrs Nanette Milne*, Bruce Crawford*, Shiona Baird*, Mr Jamie Stone*, Dave Petrie*
S2M-4730 Northfield Academy’s 50th Anniversary (lodged on 28 August 2006) Alex Johnstone*
